imdb.title: Hangyakusei Million Arthur
imdb.plot: A squad of avatars of King Arthur are assembled to travel through time and protect history.

episodes.title: Goodbye, Yama
episodes.plot: The team looks far and wide to find Yamaneko, but she's already become a changed person. Dancho is forced to say goodbye to the Yama she loves so dearly.

episodes.title: Shivering Secret Hot Springs
episodes.plot: Like Yamaneko found out, not all hot springs are equal. But that doesn't stop everyone else from taking a dip and creating problems of their own.

episodes.title: I Love Tasty Stuff
episodes.plot: When a gourmet destination turns out to be a dump, Dancho and crew put their cooking skills to the test in a cuisine showdown versus one snobby chef.

episodes.title: Utahime is Here! Rah! Rah! Rah!
episodes.plot: Imagine Yamaneko's delight when Utahime stops by for a visit. But as Yamaneko founds out, there's more to her favorite idol than meets the eye.

episodes.title: Captain Dancho
episodes.plot: Dancho and the others are forced to the field for a game of soccer. Can they somehow manage to work together and defeat the best team in Britain?

episodes.title: Altered History
episodes.plot: A city is at war due to opposing views. Kakka seems determined to do the right thing, even if it means abandoning both team and mission.

episodes.title: The Journey to Combine
episodes.plot: The stakes are raised when an Excalibur is detected in Britain's largest casino city. But they aren't having much luck finding it until Bethor goes all-in.

episodes.title: Into the Rebel Future
episodes.plot: The team must look deep within to answer the big decision ahead of them. Will Dancho and the team flee to the future or fight Pharsalia and unite as one?

episodes.title: Kako e no Hangyaku
episodes.plot: 6 Arthurs and their support fairies are sent on a mission into the past. In order to save the future, they must face and fight one million Arthurs.

episodes.title: Kindan no Seiken
episodes.plot: Renkin is upset after being treated like a child, but a scholarly bookworm sees right through her. Will she be able to handle trouble all on her own?

episodes.title: Ikari no Tekken
episodes.plot: Tekken and Kakka infiltrate a mine to look for an Excalibur but it seems too good to be true. A little more digging reveals a troubling secret.

episodes.title: With Love from the Sacred Land
episodes.plot: Yamaneko visits a sacred land for fans of her favorite idol, but her hopes of saving the city are shot down by a vengeful vegetarian sniper.

episodes.title: Within the Beautiful Light
episodes.plot: Tekken encounters an idol who is being chased by her fanatic fans. Luckily for her, Tekken feels obligated to help and becomes her temporary bodyguard.
